Added_Other.purpose: Helps maintain game performance during high traffic, ensuring smoother gameplay.

Changed_Other.name: DFStringFlagRepoGitHashDynamicString
Changed_Other.mechanism: Tracks the specific version of the codebase using a unique identifier.
Changed_Other.purpose: Helps developers manage updates and ensures players benefit from the latest features and fixes.

Changed_Other.name: DFStringFlipTimeStampDynamicString
Changed_Other.mechanism: Changes how dynamic strings handle timestamps for better performance.
Changed_Other.purpose: Enhances the responsiveness of time-related features in games.

Changed_Other.name: FStringFlagRepoGitHashFastString
Changed_Other.mechanism: Utilizes a fast string representation of the Git hash for version control.
Changed_Other.purpose: Improves the speed of version checks, ensuring players have the latest updates quickly.

Changed_Other.name: FStringFlipTimeStampFastString
Changed_Other.mechanism: Optimizes how timestamps are processed and displayed in strings.
Changed_Other.purpose: Increases performance, leading to faster loading times for time-related data.

Added_Other.name: FFlagAddNewPlayerListFocusNav_Staged
Added_Other.mechanism: Introduces a new navigation system for player lists.
Added_Other.purpose: Makes it easier for players to find and interact with others in-game.

Added_Other.name: FFlagCheckPillSelectedPressedState
Added_Other.mechanism: Implements a check for the selected state of UI pill buttons.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves UI responsiveness, making it clearer when options are selected or pressed.

Removed_Other.name: FFlagCheckPillSelectedPressedState_Staged

Removed_Network.name: FFlagFixMediaKeysMapping_Staged
Removed_Network.mechanism: Corrects the mapping of media keys on keyboards for Roblox.
Removed_Network.purpose: Ensures that media keys (like play, pause) work properly while playing games.
